name: ラフワールド
summary:
Journey to Silius, known in Japan as Rough World (ラフワールド Rafu Wārudo, stylized as [rʌf] WORLD), is a side-scrolling run and gun video game developed and published by Sunsoft for the Nintendo Entertainment System in 1990.
Journey to Silius was originally based on the 1984 film The Terminator, but the licensing rights to the film were lost during development. The graphics and storyline were altered to accommodate this change.
